snippet.title: Escape Floor 13 Trailer
snippet.description: Escape Floor 13 is a survival-puzzle game with adventure and simulation elements. Set in a mysterious hotel, players are trapped on the 13th floor and must carefully navigate each level to reach safety. The primary goal is to cross each floor and reach the elevator, but supernatural anomalies complicate the journey. If an anomaly is sensed, players must retreat to their starting point to survive. The game’s tense atmosphere is heightened by the ever-present surveillance of the hotel, challenging players to rely on their instincts to escape.
